Indices and tables
==================
.. 프로젝트의 색인 및 테이블.

General Index (genindex)
-------------------------

* :ref:`genindex`

The general index encompasses all terms and topics used throughout the RelaxSejong documentation. It is useful when you want to quickly find specific information.

Module Index (modindex)
------------------------

* :ref:`modindex`

The module index provides documentation for each module in the RelaxSejong code. It contains information about the functionality and classes related to various parts of the project.

Search Index
------------

* :ref:`search`

Utilize the search index to find specific words or phrases throughout the entire document. Searching allows for swift navigation through
